title: Full RFKOS RPG Client (1.0.7)
description:
Forum: http://forum.rfkos.com/

Game Info: 
http://forum.rfkos.com/threads/game-informations.3247/

Downloads: 
http://forum.rfkos.com/threads/downloads.3248/

Developers: 
http://gamesprotect.ru/


RPG Official Rates:

MAX LEVEL 50

(General Account)
-Experience x3
-Drop x2
-Ore Extraction x1
-Animus x3
-PT x4

(Premium Account)
-Experience x5
-Drop x4
-Ore Extraction x1
-Animus x5
-PT x6

NEW FEATURES:
1) Players under influence of Chaos Potion can not attack a player who is "not" under the influence of chaos potion.
2) Support 9-language translator to translate your chats in-game.
3) Autoloot system generator for premium services.
4) all JOBS/CLASS are able to manufacture a weapons,armors and ammos by crafting them.
5) Force skills Effect are more cooler now, than before.
6) You can mine now outside the center shaft of the core.
7) Cross Class is default & fixed.
8) RMT(real money trade) is allowed. but trade your own risk.
9) Gold Points in PB's
10) Golden Weapon Wind , Weapon slot extender and armor slot extender are available @ GOLD PIG NPC in HQ.
11) Ether , VC , Sette PB added new drops.
-gold capsules
-ability for type C.
-Blue,yellow,red,green,black stones (inside ORES for crafting)
12) all Elan PBs added new drops.
-gold capsules
-ability reavers
13) Elite Force skills/debuffs/buffs crafting is now enabled.
GUIDE:
14) Elite Force Skills/debuffs/buffs drops @ sette Turncoats.
15) Monster level - you can now see level of the monster.
16) Other Cash Shop items are available @ GOLD NPC PIG in HQ.
17) There's available items came from Cash Shop that you can buy using your Gold points.
18) CRAG MINE PORT: Accretia-Bellato-Cora have binding location, purchase HP/FP/SP and sell.
19)  3k HP , 2.5K FP , 800 SP , 5secs cure charger & Nuclear recovery potions are available at NPC crag mine.
20)  CONTROL CHIPS drop gold capsules
21) 4k hp available @ elan map. but requires lvl50 character to use it.
22) Warrior: Bash explosion / Acceleration enabled.
23) Ranger: Long Distance Firing enabled.



AND MANY MORE TO COME! :) :)
